channel.title: How to make it so you need to be within a certain # of []s to work an object
channel.description: Right now, you can use a portal in my server from halfway across the screen without walking to it then using it, just getting instantly teleported. how would i make it so you need to be within say, 2 squares to get teleported?

item.title: How to make it so you need to be within a certain # of []s to work an object
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

Amp:

i dont know

reported spammer… thats a pointless post…

Read full topic

item.title: How to make it so you need to be within a certain # of []s to work an object
item.dc:creator: @Il_Range_Il Il Range Il
item.description:
@Il_Range_Il wrote:

case 2469: //home port if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if (actionTimer == 0) { teleportToX = 3251; teleportToY = 3420; sendMessage("You tele home!"); actionTimer = 45; } } break;

Ok, this is a code i used for a portal. The

if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {

is the thing you need. i posted it all so you know where to put it in the code. If you have any problems, just pm me

Read full topic
